import React, { useState,useEffect } from 'react' import { AreaChart, Area, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer } from 'recharts'; const data = [ { month: '2015.01', a: 4000, b: 2400, c: 3400, }, { month: '2015.02', a: 3000, b: 1398, c: 2210, }, { month: '2015.03', a: 2000, b: 9800, c: 2290, }, { month: '2015.04', a: 2780, b: 3908, c: 2000, }, { month: '2015.05', a: 1890, b: 4800, c: 2181, }, { month: '2015.06', a: 2390, b: 3800, c: 2500, }, { month: '2015.07', a: 3490, b: 4300, c: 2100, }, ]; const toPercent = (decimal, fixed = 0) => `${(decimal * 100).toFixed(fixed)}%`; const getPercent = (value, total) => { const ratio = total > 0 ? value / total : 0; return toPercent(ratio, 2); }; const renderTooltipContent = (o) => { const { payload, label } = o; const total = payload.reduce((result, entry) => result + entry.value, 0); return (
